params.name: callback
params.description: Callback function to call when main UI container has loaded.

ui.events.loaded.shortDescription: Call callback function when main UI container has loaded.

params.name: callback
params.description: Callback function to call when screen has resized.

ui.events.resized.shortDescription: Call callback function when screen has resized.

ui.refresh.shortDescription: Regenerate the DOM to reflect the UI layout in `ui.screen`.

params.name: red
params.description: Amount of red to use in colour. Must be between 0 and 255 inclusive.

params.name: green
params.description: Amount of green to use in colour. Must be between 0 and 255 inclusive.

params.name: blue
params.description: Amount of blue to use in colour. Must be between 0 and 255 inclusive.

params.name: alpha
params.description: Amount of alpha transparency colour should have. Must be between 0 and 1 inclusive. Default: `1`.

ui.colour.RGBA.shortDescription: RGBA class for use with colours.

ui.colour.RGBA( ... ).generateCSS.shortDescription: Convert colour into an `rgba` CSS string for use in CSS code.

params.name: x
params.description: position or width of vector.

params.name: y
params.description: position or height of vector.

ui.Vector.shortDescription: Vector class for use with dimensions in terms of position and size.

ui.utilities.getScreenSize.shortDescription: Get the screen (viewport)'s size in pixels.

params.name: children
params.description: Children or content to include in component. Default: `[]`.

params.name: style
params.description: Styling to use on component. Default: `{}`.

params.name: attributes
params.description: HTML attributes to use on component. Default: `{}`.

params.name: events
params.description: Events to listen to on component. Default: `{}`.

params.name: domObject
params.description: DOM object to use for precomputing.

return.description: Dictionary of available functions and values for generated DOM element.

params.name: text
params.description: Text to use. Default: `""`.

params.name: html
params.description: HTML contents to use. Default: `""`.

params.name: children
params.description: Children or content to include in component. Default: `[]`.

params.name: split
params.description: Numerator of a twelth fraction used to split container by width. Must be between 1 and 12 inclusive. Default: `12`.

params.description: Styling to use on component. Default: `{}`.
